paper_abstract: The analogue of Black-Scholes formula for vanilla call option price in conditions of (B, S)-securities market with delayed response is derived. A special case of continuous-time version of GARCH is considered. The results are compared with the results of Black and Scholes. (C) 2006 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The pricing of options for securities markets with delayed response
